01/12/2016

Forty Journeys in a Silent Room

I attended a six day long meditation retreat with about 40 participants. We would start meditating as a group at 8AM and leave 13 hours later. As is normal in meditation retreats, this was all done in silence.

01/11/2016

The Why of Pride

Pride is a place to find people like you. People who are exhausted from explaining. People who lie too.

01/06/2016

Worthful

Being worthful means being full of worth. It's a way to learn how to respect yourself, whether that's by respecting your feelings, your needs, your desires, or who you are as a person. It wasn't something I felt before.
